product_name: CycleAware Lazer Shark USB Rear Bike Light
long_description: A bright taillight that uses lasers to shine two lines on either side of your bike to create the appearance of a bike lane, the Lazer Shark USB rear light clearly marks out your cycling space. Five super bright LEDs act as an eye-popping taillight, and two lasers shine lines on the pavement; lights are visible up to 600 ft. away. Taillight is weather and shock resistant. Includes two red lasers with two modes and five red LEDs with three modes. Lazer Shark USB rear light includes an integrated lithium ion battery, a USB recharging cable and a universal seat post attachment bracket.
short_description: A bright taillight that uses lasers to shine two lines on either side of your bike to create the appearance of a bike lane, the Lazer Shark USB rear light clearly marks out your cycling space.
